%%% compile with
%%%     latexuli -n -q bilder.tex 1
%%%
%%% or equivalently
%%%     latex bilder.tex
%%%     dvips -o bilder.ps bilder.dvi
%%%     
%%% then convert to png using ps2pdf and gimp:
%%%     ps2pdf bilder.ps
%%%     gimp bilder.pdf  -> hand-select region, export as png "ramp_obserr_vr.png"

\documentclass[11pt,a4paper,twoside,headinclude,footinclude,parskip=half]{scrartcl}

\usepackage[english]{babel}
\usepackage[OT1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}

\usepackage[a4paper,twoside,portrait,hmargin={1.2in,1.0in},vmargin={1.0in,1.0in},footskip=2.5em]{geometry}

\usepackage{scrpage2}

\usepackage{xspace}
\usepackage{calc,ifthen}
\usepackage{array,longtable,multicol,hhline}
\usepackage[fleqn]{amsmath}
\usepackage{amssymb}
\usepackage{graphicx,color}
\usepackage{pst-all}

\begin{document}


\begin{pspicture}[unit=0.5cm](20,12)
  \pnode[2,-1]{A}
  \pnode[2,10]{B}\pnode[1.5,10]{B1}\uput[180](B1){\textbf{\Large e\_0}}
  \pnode[1,0]{C}
  \pnode[20,0]{D}\pnode[19.5,-0.5]{D1}\uput[270](D1){\textbf{\Large dBZ}}
  \pnode[1.5,8]{E1}\uput[180](E1){\textbf{\Large e\_o\_0}}
  \pnode[6,8]{E2}
  \pnode[12,2]{E3}
  \pnode[18,2]{E4}
  \pnode[1.5,2]{F}\uput[180](F){\textbf{\Large e\_o\_1}}
  \pnode[18,8]{H4}
  \pnode[6,-0.5]{I1}\uput[270](I1){\textbf{\Large dBZ\_0}}
  \pnode[6,9]{I2}
  \pnode[12,-0.5]{J1}\uput[270](J1){\textbf{\Large dBZ\_1}}
  \pnode[12,9]{J2}
  \psset{linewidth=2pt,arrowsize=4pt 2,arrowinset=0}
  \ncline[]{->}{A}{B}
  \ncline[]{->}{C}{D}
  \ncline[linewidth=1pt,linestyle=dotted]{F}{E4}
  \ncline[linewidth=1pt,linestyle=dotted]{E1}{H4}
  \ncline[linewidth=1pt,linestyle=dotted]{I1}{I2}
  \ncline[linewidth=1pt,linestyle=dotted]{J1}{J2}
  \psline[linewidth=2pt,linestyle=dashed]{}(E1)(E2)(E3)(E4)
\end{pspicture}

\end{document}
